vclaim: A pedophilia group put up a sign reading "Pedophiles are People Too" near a school in Oregon.
title: Was a ‘Pedophiles Are People Too’ Notice Posted Near an Oregon School?
subtitle: A sign reading "Pedophiles are People Too" was briefly pinned to a telephone pole near a school in Oregon, but this poster was likely created as part of a troll campaign.
author: Dan Evon
